title: Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends                     The Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site is administered by Independence National Historical Park. The Friends of Independence Park is a non-profit organization that supports education and preservation goals of the Edgar Allan Poe National Historic Site. By joining The Friends of Independence Park, you, too, can become a park partner. Help protect our nation's heritage of liberty and democracy, and ensure that the voice of freedom continues to inspire visitors of all ages from across America and around the world.            td>
